reviewText: Audio and resolution problems. Something is wrong with the disk. Not damaged in shipping or anything like that, the file used to burn the disk must be corrupt.

Sound quality: 1
Picture quality: 1
Unwatchable due to such poor quality of production.
Scotch scotch scotch  - Good travel insight into the wonderful world of single malt and blended
First it is an interesting program with lots of information, views, and Scottish delights. The reason I gave this two stars is that the sound is very poor.
Interesting information on the background and history of the distillery and the production of single malt Scotch.  Also good intro into how to drink and enjoy an adult beverage.
A little thick on the drama, but it was an interesting documercial . I followed along by looking up the prices and options on each of the distillerys.
Those of you interested in the Western Isles of Scotland or the origins of single malt Scotch whiskey should enjoy this well put together video. Slainte' and maybe bon voyage!
